content: {"name": "The Riverside Church Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Open to individuals and families who reside from West 96th Street to West 179th Street. You must show proof of address, ID and proof of age for any children under 18 years old.", "email": "", "url": "", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "91 Claremont Ave", "address_2": "", "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10027", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.811657, "longitude": -73.96273}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 870-6733", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Toiletries, if available "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
